for_sales.sales_text:
"Gimli", a well cared for Memory 19, overall winner of the OGA Helford Regatta in 2017, is for sale. She is a fast boat with a distinguished racing history in the Solent before she came to Devon.

She is just launched onto her mooring on the Dart with a new coat of antifoul, having spent the winter in her barn under cover for the winter in Devon as she has been these last three years. 

She has a two year old SBS galvanised trailer that has never been in salt water. She has always been launched by crane. Full set of sails including topsail, plus inboard outboard. More details to follow on request.

boat.full_description: Epoxied below the waterline by the builders, Gimli carries a Tohatsu 6hp in a well. Her black hull with sand coloured decks, means she’s a real head turner and sails beautifully. As Classic Boat said of another yacht, she is ‘part of the modern tradition of fast, retro-styled daysailers’, except that she’s fine for weekending and indeed we have spent a week or more on board.
boat.name: Gimli
